TopicTitle: How to locate the parts for a downloaded craft?

Articles.Content:
What am I doing wrong here?  I go to Steam workshop and download a Vostok (stock) rocket.  Then I open a sandbox game and THERE SHE IS but there is one part missing?!  Is there a listing somewhere of what parts go into a craft and in what order or a reference for what parts download are needed to make a craft complete?

Thanks.
you can go to kerbalx.com (maybe) and look for the craft - if it is there, it will have a list of parts and mods required for that craft.
